/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the rich history of the city. Trees and lampposts add a touch of nature and illumination to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the image.
